sentences.sContent: Now I can go anywhere and make friends and find family.
sentences.sCn: 现在我可以去任何地方，结交朋友，寻找家人。

sentences.sContent: Everyone needs friends, and if you fail to make friends, you should examine yourself and see if there is something wrong with your personality.
sentences.sCn: 人人都需要朋友，若你在交朋友方面总是失败，就该反省自己，看是否你的个性有什么问题。
